origin.void-entities.void_knight.name: Void Knight
origin.void-entities.void_knight.descrip: One of the Void's stronger fighters. Only a few can face its power without dire consequences.
origin.void-entities.shade_master.name: Shade Master
origin.void-entities.shade_master.descri: An entity capable of summoning and manipulating constructs made of pure Void.
power.void-entities.void_entity.name: Void Entity
power.void-entities.void_entity.descript: You are a creature from the Void Between Worlds, capable of harnessing its highly destructive energy without repercussions.
power.void-entities.void_energy.name: Void Energy
power.void-entities.void_energy.descript: Your form can utilize the highly destructive Void energy without repercussions.
power.void-entities.void_energy_death_ga: On death, you will respawn with additional Void Energy.
power.void-entities.strong_in_the_dark.d: When in dark areas, you become stronger as the Void empowers you directly.
power.void-entities.weak_in_the_light.de: When in bright areas, you become weaker as your form attempts to flee from the light.
power.void-entities.void_knight/call_to_: By calling to the Void, you replenish your Void energy. However, while channeling, you cannot move, attack, nor interact with objects. You also take additional damage while channeling.
power.void-entities.void_knight/void_bla: You can concentrate Void energy into a physical blade. Such a concentration is taxing on your form and will constantly consume Void energy.
power.void-entities.void_knight/target_w: You can call upon the Void to see through your opponent's defenses, allowing you to deal more damage to them.
power.void-entities.void_knight/empower_: You can empower your next strike, dealing additional damage and stunning your target.
power.void-entities.void_knight/m_a_d.de: You will expel all your stored Void energy upon taking lethal damage, preventing your death and exploding as all the stored energy violently bursts into the surroundings.
power.void-entities.void_knight/behind_y: You can negate any damage and teleport behind your attacker.
power.void-entities.void_knight/dense_bo: Unless you have 20% Void Energy, you cannot float in water.
void-entities.gui.badge.damage_resist: You take reduced damage from all sources.
void-entities.gui.badge.reverse_resistan: You take additional damage from all sources.
void-entities.gui.badge.call_to_the_void: Cannot activate with full Void energy
You take additional damage from all sources while channeling.
void-entities.gui.badge.void_entity/no_f: You have no need for food.
void-entities.gui.badge.void_entity/no_a: You have no need for air.
void-entities.gui.badge.void_entity/void: You require Void energy to regenerate health.
death.attack.voidShatter.player: %1$s was overwhelmed with Void energy due to %2$s.
